author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Chennai Corporation postponed its drive against encroachments on Radhakrishnapuram off Greenways Road on Tuesday, after stiff resistance from families living there.

The Corporation and Public Works Department (PWD) have been removing encroachments along the Adyar the river part of the State Government’s steps to reclaim the river by removing unauthorised structures.

As part of this, Chennai Corporation planned to remove more than 150 families from Radhakrishnapuram.

Corporation officials said residents were asked to move to houses allotted at Ezhil Nagar in Okkiyam Thoraipakkam.

But stiff resistance of the residents forced the officials to postpone the eviction drive.

The official said the residents refused to shift to the new houses citing several reasons, including their children’s education getting affected, work displacement and inadequate transport from Thoraipakkam.
title: Eviction drive stopped
